bio.experienceSummary: I am a NJ certified teacher and I am currently employed in a public school. I have over 20 years experience of teaching and caring for children of all ages and abilities. Your child(ren) will be in great hands with me while having fun but most importantly .... safe! I am available on select week nights, the weekends while you run errands, date nights/overnights. I am available in the summer to entertain your children and have a fun summer experience full of outdoor play and exploration. I can instruct educational lessons, engage in physical activities and games indoors/outdoors, do arts/crafts, Science, help with pick up/drop off, you name it! I am dependable, structured, outgoing and trustworthy. Looking forward to helping your family with your little gems!

description.displayText: She is creative, caring. Thinks outside of the box.  She doesn't sit around but loves to be active with kids.  Very dependable. Great personality and will keep kids on schedule and follow parent directions.
description.originalText: She is creative, caring. Thinks outside of the box.  She doesn't sit around but loves to be active with kids.  Very dependable. Great personality and will keep kids on schedule and follow parent directions.

bio.experienceSummary:
Hi, 
I am a stay at home mom with two children. My daughter is at Wesleyan University playing lacrosse (proud mom) and my son is a senior in high school, committed to play lacrosse at St. Lawrence. I am also a former Westfield special education teacher and I provided early intervention for many years. I have been providing child care for newborns and up for over 15 years locally. In the last few years I have also taken on the role as house manager for several families. I have been fortunate to stay with the same families for years at a time and have the best working relationships with all of them. I am working part time now with 2 families so I only have part time hours available but can fill those with the right family. Feel free to contact me with your needs. Thanks!

My name is Julie, I have my Masters in Social Work and I have been babysitting for families in my area and NYC for the past 10 years. I have lots of experience and great references. Hope to hear from you!

I have also worked with the elderly, including those suffering from Alzheimer's. I have 4 years' experience working in a nursing home with senior citizens.

Also a huge animal lover! Happy to work in a home with animals :)

Need a Reliable Babysitter?
Hello! My name is Isel G., and I'm offering babysitting services for parents who need a break, whether for self-care, a date night, or just some time to recharge. I have over 5 years of professional experience working with children, including 3 years as a head teacher in an infant room and 2 years with the Board of Education. I've also completed college coursework in Early Childhood Education and have experience tutoring children in my community.

As a mother, I understand the importance of providing a safe, nurturing, and enriching environment. I offer flexible babysitting services and would love to help take care of your little ones while you take some time for yourself.

If you're interested, feel free to reach out to me for more details!

description.originalText: We couldn’t be happier with Isel! She are incredibly responsible, patient, and attentive to my children’s needs. My kids absolutely adore her and always looking towards seen her. Isel goes above and beyond, engaging them with creative activities and ensuring they feel safe and cared for. I trust her completely and highly recommend her services to any family in need of a dependable and caring babysitter!

bio.experienceSummary:
I'm a compassionate and responsible caregiver with a passion for nurturing children's growth and development. Inspired by my mother's loving care, I strive to create a warm and enriching environment where children feel safe, respected, and loved.

With four years of experience caring for children of various ages infants- 13 I have honed my skills in fostering their intellectual, emotional, and social well-being. My patient and calm demeanor allows me to handle challenging situations with composure and creativity. I believe in open communication with parents and follow their preferred methods to ensure a collaborative partnership.

I excel at organizing engaging activities that cater to children's interests and developmental needs. From outdoor sports to educational games, I find joy in sparking their curiosity and imagination. My dedication extends to assisting with household tasks, meal preparation, animal care and travel supervision.

Hello! I'm Kerene, a dedicated nanny with over 5 years of experience in childcare and a passion for nurturing young minds. I began my professional journey in 2014, outside of caring for my younger siblings since they were babies, and now they are aged 8, 10, and 13. Alongside my role as a teacher assistant, I've honed my skills in organizing activities, preparing meals, bedtime stories, and even teaching a bit of French. Creating a safe, structured, and loving environment where children can thrive brings me immense joy. I look forward to bringing my experience, positivity, and genuine care to your family!

description.displayText: This review is long overdue! From our first phone call, I knew Kerene was the one. Not only is she punctual, dependable and responsible, but she is so very loving and attentive to our 2 young children. She became family from day 1. My children loved all the fun adventures they went on and always came home with a story. Never a dull moment. I knew my children were in the best care and never had to worry leaving them. She also helped keep the home neat and prepared meals when needed. Kerene is an absolute God sent!
description.originalText: This review is long overdue! From our first phone call, I knew Kerene was the one. Not only is she punctual, dependable and responsible, but she is so very loving and attentive to our 2 young children. She became family from day 1. My children loved all the fun adventures they went on and always came home with a story. Never a dull moment. I knew my children were in the best care and never had to worry leaving them. She also helped keep the home neat and prepared meals when needed. Kerene is an absolute God sent!

bio.experienceSummary:
Hello, I'm Desiree, and I am excited to offer my childcare services. With over 10 years of experience working with children, I am confident in my ability to provide a nurturing and fun environment for kids. For the past 9 years, I have been a full-time educator. In addition, I've had the pleasure of working as a private tutor and a babysitter. I've worked with children ranging from 4 months to 14 years old, helping to support their growth, development, and learning at every stage. 

As I seek a full-time childcare position, I'm looking forward to bringing my experience, attention to detail, and dedication to a family where I can create a safe and engaging environment. 

If you're looking for a reliable, responsible, and experienced caregiver, I'd love to connect and discuss how I can support your family's needs!

Hi, I'm Valerie! Experience with children as well as the elderly. I really think I could be the girl you're looking for. I love kids-talking, teaching, having fun while maintaining the boundaries you set. We always think that we are the ones teaching kids, but I've come to realize that kids also teach us a lot about life! Letting us into their world is a privilege I don't take lightly. I drive, and am comfortable running errands or helping with chores, heating up/making simple meals or any other tasks that you need assistance with besides your munchkin!

I believe care. com performs a background check, but it's my church policy to run a background check on anyone who is volunteering and I have a copy from a year-year and a half ago that I'd be willing to share. 

References available upon request and feel free to ask any questions! Hope to hear from you soon!

Valerie

Hi parents!
I am an enthusiastic & attentive caretaker with 9 years of experience working with children ages 0-12, and people with special needs ages 5-22. I have experience in roles such as live-in nanny, substitute teacher, babysitter, daycare assistant, special needs aid, camp counselor, housekeeper and more. I have CPR and New York State emergency medical training. 

I am passionate about providing warm, trustworthy services for parents, and working together to help children reach their age appropriate milestones, do active activities daily, connect with nature, develop skills and create a joyful, fun, environment where children feel safe, loved and celebrated. 

I can also provide assistance with cooking, light errands, and homework. Message me for my resume and references.

About me: In my free time, I love spending time in nature, learning about plants, trees, and fungi and hosting events. I enjoy art, Mary Oliver poems, reading, embroidering, building, and people.

description.originalText: Malka took care of our baby boy during the day while we worked from home for 3 months, from the time he was 7 months old until 10 months old. She was very personable and nice to be around in our home. At first our boy was clingy and upset to be left with someone new, but by the end of her time with us he was very excited to see her when she arrived. She read him a lot of books, took him for walks and talked to him a lot, showing him things around the house and neighborhood. She even wrote a nice letter of tips and tricks for the new nanny, which showed how thoughtful she was. She was happy to take instructions and do things the way we ask. She kept us updated on the app that we use and by sending photos during the day. We appreciated having her help and were sad to see her go.

bio.experienceSummary:
As a childcare provider with five years of experience, I am passionate about supporting families and enriching the lives of children. My journey into caregiving began with fulfilling babysitting roles, which solidified my desire to make a positive impact on children's development.

I am a patient, creative, and friendly individual who believes in fostering a nurturing environment for children to thrive. Effective communication is key, so I ensure regular updates and follow the parents' preferred communication method to keep them informed about their child's day.

Enforcing household rules comes naturally to me, and I have experience caring for one child at a time. In terms of activities, I enjoy engaging children in outdoor sports, board games, puzzles, and educational games that stimulate their learning.

My educational background includes some college coursework, and I have completed First Aid and CPR training. I currently work as a lead prek3 teacher in cranford!
